doc0100t.name: doc0100t
doc0100t.label: Have you visited doctors (incl. dentists) with [name of child] during the last 12 months? (This also includes check-ups, visits to psychotherapists, health practitioners, chiropractors, etc.)

items.text: Have you visited doctors (incl. dentists) with [name of child] during the last 12 months? (This also includes check-ups, visits to psychotherapists, health practitioners, chiropractors, etc.)
